outputs.output_descr: The project was established in 2004 to support the communications unit in performing its core functions. The communications unit is responsible for all facets of communication at UNDP/PAPP. The main objectives of the unit are to (1) enhance the image and visibility of UNDP, in the oPt and within the immediate region, including Israel, donors, and the international community at large, (2) support UNDP outcomes and strategic objectives and (3) strengthen internal communications flow with external communications potential. This is achieved through the production and dissemination of press releases and publications, organization of outreach and public relations events, development and hosting of PAPP's web site and intranet among others.

project_descr: The project was established in 2004 to support the communications unit in performing its core functions. The communications unit is responsible for all facets of communication at UNDP/PAPP.
